txt.en:
The bounty notice reads:

Wanted: The slaying of the morroval known as Legwêna. Do not attempt unless you are an experienced warrior. She has killed some and injured many. Morutágya wants her head! See Porókho for reward.

Scrawled underneath this in another handwriting is an additional message that reads:

Please do not actually bring us a head. That is gruesome.
-Eshéra
You have defeated the morroval, Legwêna. You should return to Porókho at his camp in Hêbatokh to claim your reward.
Morutágya Clan has called for the death of the morroval known as Legwêna.
'Oh-ho!  You have slain Legwêna? This is good news! You did not bring her head though? That is ok. I will reward you anyway.'
Legwêna is located in the western side of Ilmabiri; the Wells.
